title: Unspecified error occured.
body: Ok, so I un-installed League, and I go to reinstall it and it literally fails each time, the closest I got was %90, I've tried every method, delete this file, run as admin, download this, I even reset my computer to factory settings, please, if you know how to fix it, help <3!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
I'm not Katarina, but I can certainly help!

Failures after the 33% mark during patching are usually caused by a poor connection to the patching servers. This is because the client is actually pulling files from the server, which it only does during the last 67% of patching. I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it commonly resolves these types of issues.

Let me know if this worked for you.
